data.prayer: There are 2,029,100 people living in the county of Firozpur. Only about 22,320 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Firozpur, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 22,320 believers in Firozpur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 164 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Firozpur, Punjab, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Firozpur, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Firozpur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jat Gil (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jat Gil (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Firozpur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 22,320 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,006,780 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Firozpur, Punjab, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
